      • assembleNormalPrizeItem

        protected void assembleNormalPrizeItem(PrizeDto prize,
                           PrizeItemDto prizeItem,
                           BaseTicket ticket,
                           java.util.List<? extends BaseWinningItem> winningItems)
                                throws ApplicationException
        从类复制的说明: AbstractPrizeService
        Assemble a PrizeItemDto which represents the winning statistics of a specific game instance based on winning items.

        NOTE that for normal prize, only cash will be handled, no logic to handle object prize.

        覆盖:
        assembleNormalPrizeItem 在类中 AbstractPrizeService
        抛出:
